user_kicks.en: {user} has been kicked {kicks} times and has kicked people {kicked} times.
user_kicks.es: Se ha expulsado {user} {kicks} veces y {user} ha expulsado personas {kicked} veces.
user_kicks.na'vi: Tuteol {user}it tsrame'i {kicks} hìmtxan ulte sute tsrame'i {kicked} hìmtxan.
user_kicks.cy: Cafwyd {user} ei gicio {kicks} gwaith ac wedi cicio pobl {kicked} gwaith.
user_kicks.nl: {user} is {kicks} keer gekickt en heeft anderen {kicked} keer gekickt.
user_kicks.de: {user} wurde {kicks} mal gekickt und hat {kicked} mal andere Benutzer gekickt.
user_kicks.fr: {user} a été kické {kicks} fois et a kické des personnes {kicked} fois.
user_kicks.it: {user} ha ricevuto {kicks} pedata/e e ha dato {kicked} pedata/e a altri utenti

quieted.en: Quieted {quietee}. Remember: don't be a coconut.
quieted.fr: {quietee} a été rendu silencieux. Rappelle-toi : ne sois pas têtu.
quieted.it: {quietee} è stato silenziato. Ricordati: non essere testardo

tquieted.en: Quieted {quietee} for {minutes} minutes. Remember: don't be a coconut.
tquieted.fr: {quietee} a été rendu silencieux pour {minutes} minutes. Rappelle-toi : ne sois pas têtu.
tquieted.it: {quietee} è stato silenziato per {minutes} minuto/i. Ricordati: non essere testardo

unquieted.en: Unquieted {quietee}. Remember: don't be a coconut.
unquieted.fr: {quietee} peut maintenant parler. Rappelle-toi : ne sois pas têtu.
unquieted.it: {quietee} può nuovamente parlare. Ricordati: non essere testardo.

ckicked.en: Attention: {kicker} has kicked {kickee} from {channel}. The reason given was: "{reason}."
ckicked.cy: Sylw: {kicker} wedi cicio'r {kickee} o {channel}. Y rheswm a roddwyd oedd: "{reason}."
ckicked.fr: Attention : {kicker} a kické {kickee} de {channel}. Raison donnée : "{reason}."
ckicked.it: Attenzione : {kicker} ha dato una pedata a {kickee} di {channel}. Motivo : "{reason}."

cbanned.en: Attention: {banner} has banned {banee} from {channel}. The reason given was "{reason}."
cbanned.cy: Sylw: {banner} wedi gwahardd {banee} o {channel}. Y rheswm a roddwyd oedd: "{reason}."
cbanned.fr: Attention : {banner} a banni {banee} de {channel}. Raison donnée : "{reason}."

tbanned.en: Attention: {banner} has banned {banee} from the {network} network for {hours} hours. The reason given was "{reason}."
tbanned.fr: Attention : {banner} a banni {banee} du réseau {network} pour {hours} heures. Raison donnée : "{reason}."
tbanned.it: Attenzione : {banner} ha bandito {banee} dalla rete {network} per {hours} ora/e. Motivo : "{reason}."

tbanned_notify.en: You have been banned from the {network} network for {hours} hours by {banner}. The reason given was "{reason}." You can join {admin_channel} for more information or to discuss the ban.
tbanned_notify.fr: Vous avez été banni du réseau {network} pour {hours} heures par {banner}. La raison donnée était "{reason}." Vous pouvez rejoindre {admin_channel} pour plus d'information or pour discuter du ban.
tbanned_notify.it: Sei stato bandito dalla rete {network} per {hours} ora/e da {banner}. Motivo: "{reason}." Puoi ricongiungere {admin_channel} per ulteriori informazioni o discutere sulla messa al bando.

nbanned.en: Attention: {banner} has banned {banee} from the {network} network. The reason given was "{reason}."
nbanned.cy: Sylw: {banner} wedi gwahardd {banee} ledled y rhwydwaith. Y rheswm a roddwyd oedd: "{reason}."
nbanned.de: Achtung: {banner} hat {banee} auf dem gesamten Netzwerk gebannt. Grund: "{reason}."
nbanned.fr: Attention : {banner} a banni {banee} du réseau {network}. Raison donnée : "{reason}."
nbanned.it: Attentione : {banner} ha bandito {banee} dalla rete {network}. Motivo : "{reason}."

nbanned_notify.en: You have been banned from the {network} network by {banner}. The reason given was "{reason}." You can join {admin_channel} for more information or to discuss the ban.
nbanned_notify.fr: Vous avez été banni du réseau {network} par {banner}. La raison donnée était "{reason}." Vous pouvez rejoindre {admin_channel} pour plus d'information or pour discuter du ban.
nbanned_notify.it: Sei stato bandito dalla rete {network} da {banner}. Motivo: "{reason}." Puoi ricongiungere {admin_channel} per ulteriori informazioni o discutere sulla messa al bando.

nban_quote.en: {banee} was banned from the network by {banner} on {time}. The reason given was "{reason}."
nban_quote.cy: Cafodd {banee} ei wahardd o'r rhwydwaith gan {banner} ar {time}. Y rheswm a roddwyd oedd: "{reason}."
nban_quote.de: {banee} wurde von {banner} auf dem gesamten Netzwerk um {time} gebannt. Grund: "{reason}."
nban_quote.fr: {banee} a été banni du réseau par {banner} à {time}. Raison donnée : "{reason}."
nban_quote.it: {banee} è stato bandito dalla rete da {banner} a {time}. Motivo : "{reason}."

no_user.en: {user} doesn't seem to be online on this server.
no_user.fr: {user} ne semble pas être connecté à ce serveur.
no_user.it: {user} sembra non essere connesso a questo server

nunbanned.en: Attention: {unbanee} has been unbanned from the {network} network by {unbanner}.
nunbanned.fr: Attention : {unbanee} a été débanni du réseau {network} par {unbanner}.
nunbanned.it: Attenzione : {unbanee} è stato riammesso alla rete {network} da {unbanner}.

nunban_notify.en: You have been unbanned from the {network} network by {unbanner}.
nunban_notify.fr: Vous avez été débanni du réseau {network} par {unbanner}.
nunban_notify.it: Sei stato riammesso alla rete {network} da {unbanner}.

nunban_error.en: It appears {unbanee} was not banned using the ~nban command.
nunban_error.fr: Il semble que {unbanee} n'a pas été banni en utilisant la commande ~nban.
nunban_error.it: Sembar che {unbanee} non è stato bandito usano il commando ~nban.

quote_recorded.cy: Mae hyn wedi cael ei gofnodi yn ~ban_{user}.
